original_text: Shallum the son of Jabesh began to reign in the thirty-ninth year of Uzziah king of Judah, and he reigned one month in Samaria.
korean_text: 유다 왕 웃시야 제삼십구년에 야베스의 아들 살룸이 사마리아에서 왕이 되어 한 달 동안 다스리니라

sentences.original_text: Shallum the son of Jabesh began to reign
in the thirty-ninth year of Uzziah king of Judah
He reigned one month in Samaria
